text: aur agar koee aurat apane shauhar kee jyaadatee va betavajjohee se (talaaq ka) khauf rakhatee ho to miyo beevee ke baaham kisee tarah milaap kar lene mein donon (mein se kisee par) kuchh gunaah nahin hai aur sulah to (baharahaal) behatar hai aur bukhl se to qareeb qareeb har tabiyat ke ham pahaloo hai aur agar tum nekee karo aur parahejadaaree karo to khuda tumhaare har kaam se khabaradaar hai (vahee tumako ajr dega)
